name: PUT - Update a User Data

steps.name: When I do a "PUT" request to "usuario" endpoint with "update" data
Then the status code should be "200"
And the "message" with "Registro alterado com sucesso" is on response body
And validate if the "usuario" data was "updated" on the server

fullName: Happy Path to CRUD flow to Users: PUT - Update a User Data
